title: Microsoft could be bringing ads to the Windows 11 File Explorer
content:
Microsoft is apparently getting ready to bring ads to even more of its products. This time, it’s the File Explorer in Windows 11 that seems to be infected by Microsoft’s self-promotion, according to what’s been reported by some Windows Insiders. Twitter user Florian B, who is also a Windows Insider MVP, shared a screenshot of

The post Microsoft could be bringing ads to the Windows 11 File Explorer appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Some Windows Insiders have reported seeing ads in the Windows 11 File Explorer, particularly in build 22572, which was released last week.
